messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

assistance needed re opening resolved ticket tuesday error worked added has assigned dears please re thank regards analyst tuesday error worked added has assigned hello please advised record number has assigned please review details take appropriate action reference number details requested location center summary error worked additional comments requirements tuesday ore hi please rise earliest convenience thank regards tuesday ore care ii ca ore si si ore leader assign reference assignment summary location please link kind regards ref msg
